propertiesMeta.name: currentTemperature
propertiesMeta.description: The current temperature. (Default: RoomTempSen1, DataType: Analog)

propertiesMeta.name: temperatureAdjust
propertiesMeta.description: The adjustment of the temperature setpoint. (Default: RoomTempAdj, DataType: Analog)

propertiesMeta.name: controlHeating
propertiesMeta.description: The controller for heating mode. (Default: HeatCoolPID::ControlHeating, DataType: Loop)

propertiesMeta.name: controlCooling
propertiesMeta.description: The controller for cooling mode. (Default: HeatCoolPID::ControlCooling, DataType: Loop)

propertiesMeta.name: name
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the HeatingCooling. (Default: sName, DataType: string)

propertiesMeta.name: roomTemp
propertiesMeta.description: The current temperature. (Default: RoomTemp, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: roomTempAdj
propertiesMeta.description: The adjustment of the temperature setpoint. (Default: RoomTempAdj, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: heatingSetpoint
propertiesMeta.description: The setpoint for heating. (Default: HeatingSetpoint, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: heatingActive
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the heating is active or not. (Default: HeatingActive, DataType: boolean / number)

propertiesMeta.name: coolingSetpoint
propertiesMeta.description: The setpoint for cooling. (Default: CoolingSetpoint, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: coolingActive
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the cooling is active or not. (Default: CoolingActive, DataType: boolean / number)
